mapper.select: select t.tnum,t.tid,t.tcontent,m.img,t.timage,t.tmovie,t.inputdate,m.nickname from talk t join allmember m on t.tid=m.id order by t.tnum desc
select t.tnum,t.tid,t.tcontent,m.img,t.timage,t.tmovie,t.inputdate,m.nickname from talk t join allmember m on t.tid=m.id and tnum=#{tnum} order by t.tnum desc
select * from talk where tid=#{id} order by inputdate desc
